statements: SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, template_id FROM email_campaigns WHERE trigger_event = 'new_signup';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE template_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, trigger_event FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE template_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM email_campaigns
SELECT * FROM template;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM template WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM trigger WHERE trigger_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_conditions FROM trigger ORDER BY trigger_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_name, template_content FROM template WHERE template_name LIKE '%notification%' ORDER BY template_id ASC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM template WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM template WHERE template_name LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_description FROM trigger WHERE trigger_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY trigger_name ASC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM template JOIN trigger ON template.template_id = trigger.trigger_id;
SELECT DISTINCT template_id, template_name FROM template WHERE template_content LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY template_id;
SELECT * FROM triggers;
SELECT trigger_name FROM triggers WHERE trigger_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_trigger_id, campaign_template_id FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE trigger_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, template_content FROM campaigns JOIN templates ON campaigns.campaign_template_id = templates.template_id;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_description FROM triggers WHERE trigger_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_trigger_id FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM triggers;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_type FROM triggers ORDER BY trigger_name DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates WHERE LENGTH(template_content) > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_description FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'manual';
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_description FROM triggers ORDER BY trigger_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%';
SELECT template_name, JSON_LENGTH(template_variables) AS num_variables FROM templates WHERE num_variables > 3 ORDER BY num_variables DESC;
SELECT * FROM triggers;
SELECT trigger_id, trigger_description FROM triggers WHERE trigger_id = 1;
SELECT trigger_id, trigger_condition, trigger_action FROM triggers ORDER BY trigger_condition DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_body FROM templates WHERE template_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM campaign_subscriptions WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM triggers ORDER BY trigger_id DESC;
SELECT trigger_description FROM triggers WHERE trigger_condition = 'new';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT template_name, template_body FROM templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT subscriber_email, subscriber_name FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
